description:
![Screenshot of Norton Text Search Resurrection](http://gverkade.home.xs4all.nl/ts/images/ts_screenshot1.jpg)

##Norton Text Search Resurrection

Do you still miss the Norton Text Search utility from the late '80's? Then download the modern remake.
It is still a command line utility, but now it can handle long filenames, gives you the opportunity to skip files and is aware of the size of your command prompt.

Never heard of the the Norton Text search? It is a command line utility that allows you to search for a certain text within files; either text-files or binary files.
summary: Modern OS equivelant of Norton Text Search from Norton Utilities in the 80s/90s
author: Geert Verkade
